titles.title: A bill to provide for the transfer of administrative jurisdiction over certain Federal land in the State of California, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for the transfer of administrative jurisdiction over certain Federal land in the State of California, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 118-311.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin with amendments. With written report No. 118-178.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 394.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
